body: $PQEFF What really frustrated me with PQEFF was the tweet from Sept 12th.  The company tweeted the revocation of its cease trade order.  Well
created_at: thanks for that.  This was news that had been released on Aug 30th
column3: and yet the stock was still halted.  Completely tone deaf on their part to tweet this news like they had solved the problem.

body: $PQEFF There really should only be 3 types of shareholders/posters on the message boards at this point:
1) longs who want everyone to buy so share price goes up past 74 cents and the deal is voted down
2) flippers and buyout chasers who want everyone to buy so they can sell earlier than February at close to buyout price
3) those who spread FUD and want people to tender their shares ASAP
created_at: I wonder why they would want to do that or who would benefit more than shareholders who are better off with option 1 or 2?
